name: Nico Limbara
about_me: Web Developer with 3 years experience and a demonstrated history of working in the E-commerce industry. Skilled in Vue.js, PHP, jQuery, HTML, and JavaScript. Strong engineering professional graduated from mikroskil. I'm currently still learning on to improve in web development.

experiences.description: Me and my friend was working to move dealjava' API from CI to Laravel Lumen in the early days and fixing bugs. Currently working on a new Project called DIYO(diyo.app) focusing on API Development & 3rd party API integration.

I worked on dealjava.com desktop and mobile interface. when i first came to work here, i had the chance to build the website from scratch because dealjava had a new design. The desktop and mobile site was built with Vue on a different codebase. Also work on features and fix bugs.
